entity.name: condition_property
entity.description: A condition_property is a type of general_property_association that specifies a Physical_quantity_range (as defined in the ARM) for a Property_condition (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: base_definition
explicit.description: the Physical_quantity_range that contains the physical quantity value possessed by each member of a class.

where.label: link_to_condition
where.description: the Physical_quantity_range shall be referenced by a property condition.

entity.name: property_condition_for_activity
entity.description: A property_condition_for_activity is a type of class_of_possession_of_property_by_activity that is a Property_condition (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: property_condition_for_product
entity.description: A property_condition_for_product is a type of class_of_possession_of_property_by_product that is a Property_condition (as defined in the ARM).
